values.help:
Configuration Value 1: 1-255
      Configuration Value 1  is to Specify the time that Smart Switch need blink, The unit is Second;
      Configuration Value 2: 1-255
      Configuration Value 2  is to Specify the Cycle of on/off, the unit of it is 0.1 second.
values.label: Blinking behavior

values.help: Load will be closed when the Current overruns (EU 16.2A) for more than 2 minutes
values.label: Current Overload Protection

values.help: Configure the output load status after re-power on.
values.label: Output Load Status

values.help: Defines the automated status notification of an associated device when status changes
values.label: Notification status

values.help: The value represents the minimum change in wattage for a Report to be sent (default 25 W)
values.label: Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)

values.help: The value represents the minimum percentage change in wattage for a Report to be sent (Default 5)
values.label: Minimum Change to send Report (%)

values.help: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.
values.label: Default Group Reports

values.help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 Reserved
	 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                     bit 3 MRC(KWH)
		     bit 2 MRC(watt)
		     bit 1 MSRC
		     bit 0 reserved

	The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.

	The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.

	The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.
values.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 1

values.help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 2. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 Reserved
	 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                     bit 3 MRC(KWH)
		     bit 2 MRC(watt)
		     bit 1 MSRC
		     bit 0 reserved

	The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.

	The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.

	The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.
values.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 2

values.help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 Reserved
	 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                     bit 3 MRC(KWH)
		     bit 2 MRC(watt)
		     bit 1 MSRC
		     bit 0 reserved

	The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.

	The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.

	The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.
values.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3

values.help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.
values.label: Set 111-113 to default

values.help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.
values.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 1

values.help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.
values.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 2

values.help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.
values.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 3
